actions.text: On agreeing to the Schrader amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 75 - 348 (Roll no. 36).

description: Amendment sought to add findings stating that Simpson-Bowles created a balanced package of revenue and spending reforms which should form the basis for meeting the requirements of the bill.
purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 113-8 to add findings stating Simpson-Bowles created a balanced package of revenue and spending reforms which should form the basis for meeting the requirements of this act.
